string.text: A couple of helicopters have just passed me. Coordinates enclosed. Stay safe. I don't know what their orders are.
We're continuing on the same bearing from the downed helicopter in the marshes. Nothing so far.\nShit, it's Duty!\nGo to the private channel, quickly!
Waves of mutants coming from the northwest. See attached coordinates.
Waves of mutants, coming from the northern valley.
Waves of mutants heading east, presumably from the Dark Valley.
Mayday! A pack of dogs is coming straight for us! Exact coordinates attached. Anyone! Please help!
If it's not mutants, it's bandits...\nPotap:\nYes, we can guess...
Just been rushed by a Pseudodog. Barely shot it in time!\nPotap:\nWell done...
Mayday! A battle has broken out at the Agricultural Industry in the central complex!
Duty:\n Anyone doing the same as in here, be warned - you WILL be raided...
Lukash, the Merc's been shot, as you ordered. On my way back.\nFreedom\nSwitch to the private channel, assholes!
Two, Three, Seven, return to base and consolidate.
Marauders! We're being attacked! Help!\nNo one can help unless you attach your coordinates. Idiot...

We need access to the Internet. Should we make our way to the Bar, where it's crowded, or go further on to Sidorovich where it's more private?\nPotap:\nYes, the Bar will always be busy, but you can try the signallers at Duty. They also have access
Has anyone figured out where those ALD weapons are?\nIt's probably a trap anyway...
Crap!\n Just stepped in the biggest pile of boar shit ever!
Where the hell am I?\nWhy is it so foggy out here?...
I'm lost! I need help...\n Is anybody receiving me?\n Anybody...?
So that explains it, but I don't know where the signal is coming from...
In the Swamps, a Stalker named Kalmyak sells medical ointment. It really helps! Almost all my symptoms have gone. Much better than vodka. Really!
I'm going to try using emoticons more often :) ;) 8)... Communication scrambled...\nPotap:\n Idiot blocked...
There's a huge beast in the swamps. It's incredibly strong, and almost two metres tall! All the Bandits near the church are covered in blood, and it's still alive. I gave them a bandage to share...
Just came from the Reconnoitred Earth. There's an an Electric Chimera grazing by the lake! I do NOT advise going there...
Attention, all fighters! Bandits are trying to take over the ATP! This is our territory! Help us defend it!
\n A group of five heavily armed men are moving towards the Barrier. They look like Monolith. Take immediate action!
Barrier:\n Understood. Those fucking lunatics!
Warning: In a small village in the Dark Valley, if you're offered a Gauss rifle for 800 roubles - don't believe it. It's a scam!
What the hell? Just when you think everything's quietened down for the night, at exactly 21.00 a shitload of fucking green-eyed zombies appear! I've heard of it, but never seen it happen here before!
I've just heard that in the Red Forest there's a huge catfish swimming in the river. That would look great on a wall...
You're not going to believe this, but a dead dog has just fallen out of the sky right next to me...
I've heard that twenty people, on average, die each day in the Zone. I'm still here, but I see fewer and fewer old faces each day. My time is bound to come soon...
The client has accepted our price, and given us the details. Now we have a job to do...
I heard you know about some laboratory. X-16? X-18? X-20? Tell me what you know, or you're dead...
I heard that at the Bar there's one guy, an informant of sorts. He sells transmutation Recipes for artefacts. Check it out...
Fuck! It's impossible to get through Pripyat, what with those bastard helicopters shooting the shit out of anything that moves!
On the way to Limansk, I got trapped in a construction site full of Monolith! Gettin' outa here quick before I'm seen!
I drank some crap vodka. This is the second day I've been sat on the shitter, throwing up in a bucket...
Nobody knows who the shooter is? Well, one group is very interested in finding out - and they're offering a large reward...
There's a Snork here still alive after taking both barrels in the head. That's one tough mofo!
Looks like the bastard offspring of two mutant species is living in the woods here...
Just killed a Chimera, but they usually go around in pairs...
Just saw a pile of withered corpses, totally sucked dry. Must be a den of Bloodsuckers near by...
Looking for a technician, preferably with experience of night vision devices. Dust-free working environment. Decent pay
Found an exoskeleton in the ATP. Put in on and used it for ages, until I fell into a Springboard. Now, it's up in space somewhere...
For Sale - Old exoskeleton. Sealing system is damaged, but otherwise in good condition
Just fended off a large wave of mutants. Expecting another one soon. Anyone who can help, please come quickly...
The Duty warehouse has just received a batch of brand new FN-2000's. You need to get there quickly if you want to loot... sorry, buy one
Damn! The area around Yantar is full of zombies again! Neat job you did there, people!\nPotap:\nContinue with the mission. We still need that information...
Talk with the Bandits. They should know how to get through that area quietly...
Attention all Stalkers who wish to clear their debts - go to a private channel for information on the upcoming mutant raid and... other operations.
Went to Darkscape looking for Tweed\nGot chased out by a group of soldiers. No idea who they were...
Is anybody out there?\nI need assistance. Anybody?\nWhere the hell am I?...
FSS?\nWhat the hell is that, anyway? Probably a bunch of jerks looking to cause trouble, no doubt!
I had it!\nIt was awesome! But I lost it...\nIt just flew right outta my hand and disappeared... I can't find it... I've got to find it...
Did you hear about F1?\nEveryone's dead. It's far too hot to enter, and there's no clues as to what happened!
Let's meet at the Bar up north. Don't forget some vodka for the guards at the gate...
Just tried to go to the old research station.\nWatch out! There's something definitely something wrong with that place. Something very, very hostile...
Top end military goods!\nAt the Black Market, for the next few days only...
Almost had it back!\nOn the rooftops, near the generators. But then it sliced up some Monolith bastards and disappeared again!
Hey, did you hear?\nThe Duty commander in Rostok has lost his marbles. He actually sent out a team to find a panda bear for him to take back to Moscow...
Watch out at the Dead Marshes.\nOur whole village has been occupied by group of military assholes!
Need a Stalker. Must be discreet to carry out some... delicate work. Do not respond to this directly, but to the Base.
Work available, to search for equipment. Payment per item found. Look for me in the Reconnoitered Earth, in the Infirmary.
Looking for experienced Stalkers to raid for artefacts. Contact Colonel Petrenko.
In exchange for rare artefacts, I can now upload new firmware to your PDA. Even a satellite channel. Contact Lanky.
Heh-heh, even at my highest rates, the client is still desperate to do business with me!
Looking for a Stalker specialising in combination locks, with experience of raids in the north of the Zone.
I heard the Americans sent us a superhero. It'll be interesting to see him.
Do not go through the underground tunnels. They're full of mutants! Take the surface routes instead...
Hey, they've got a shisha pipe in the Bar! Best get there quick before it gets raided!
Everyone! Beware of staying in warehouses in the countryside. They're being burned down systematically, and bodies staked out on posts!
Sakharov pays well for exclusive items from raids! Requires resourceful Stalker to explore Lab X-16. Must have experience with zombies and Bloodsuckers...

We need Stalkers for incursions into the Wild Territory. High rates of pay for successful results. Kruglov.\nLabelled\nStalkers, if you want to keep your sanity, do not meet up with this so-called Scientist. He's a fucking nutcase!
Join our ranks of experienced trackers. No admission fee. Zahar
Baldy\nGet a move on! If I see something coming I'll shoot...
We need Stalkers with expertise of deep raids into the Zone. Payment commensurate with skill and results. If interested, respond privately to discuss a meeting
Wolf, if you can talk freely, please come in...
Stalkers, join Duty! Defend the planet from the new plague that is upon us...
Spam\nMoskvin coffee - a really, truly, nasty coffee made in China!
Spam\nLost - weapons. If found, please return them to me at the old Stardusk wreck in Backwater. Come alone!
Spam\nAntizombin - keeps the zombie in you at bay - even better than vodka!
Spam\nMoskvin coffee relieves you of constipation in exactly 30 seconds. No more, no less...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]We have a problem with the equipment. If it carries on like this, we'll lose contact with the Base altogether within the next 48 hours...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Stalkers - Join Duty! Help us to protect the world from the dangers of the Zone...

%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Switch to a private channel, then download the security updates.\nWe could have a total network breach, just because you were too lazy to patch your PDA... Asshole!
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Information on the upcoming mutant raid, and other operations, available on a private channel. Downloading now...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Stalkers - join Duty. Defend the planet from the infected Zone!
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Looking for experienced Stalkers to assist in eliminating a group of Snorks. Rewards will be on a per capita basis...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Looking for experienced Stalkers for a raid against mutants. Usual rates apply...
%c[255,160,160,160]DUTY:\n%c[default]Looking for experienced Stalkers for a raid on Freedom. See General Voronin at the Duty base

%c[255,160,160,160]Petrenko\n%c[default]I was a rust repairer. A rust repairer and full-time survivor.\nAll the major earthquakes, a tsunami, and multiple air crashes... So stop telling me what to do!
%c[255,160,160,160]Voronin\n%c[default]It is far better to have a lion at the head of an army of sheep, than a sheep at the head of an army of lions...

%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]My life fades. The vision dims. All that remains are memories. I remember a time of chaos. Ruined dreams. This wasted land.
But most of all, I remember the Wish Granter, and the man we called Strelok.
To understand who he was, you have to go back to another time - when the world was powered by black energy...
%c[255,160,160,160]FREEDOM:\n%c[default]Long live Freedom! Let us make peace with the Zone, and make it a better place for everyone!
%c[255,160,160,160]FREEDOM:\n%c[default]Join Freedom! Together we'll make the Zone a better place!
%c[255,160,160,160]FREEDOM:\n%c[default]Looking for experienced Stalkers to join a hunt for rare artefacts. Fair prices offered!
%c[255,160,160,160]LUKASH:\n%c[default]Stalkers! Save Freedom! If you want to live a peaceful life in the Zone, without Duty oppression, then come join us!\nWe always welcome new blood!

%c[255,160,160,160]LUKASH:\n%c[default]Attention Freedom! Switch immediately to a private channel, and update your PDA's with the latest protection patch. Then your transmissions won't be intercepted by Duty...
%c[255,160,160,160]FREEDOM:\n%c[default]If you're on a mission, switch to a private channel. Always assume that there are people listening...
